title: Chicken with Creamy Sesame Noodles
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil for the noodles.
Meanwhile, combine the first 10 ingredients (tahini through sesame oil) in a blender. Process to a smooth, creamy sauce. Set aside.
Toast the sesame seeds in a small skillet over medium heat, stirring often, until golden and fragrant. Immediately transfer the seeds to a bowl, and set aside.
When the water boils, add the soba noodles. Boil for 4 to 5 minutes, testing often, until no longer hard in the center. Drain and immediately run under cold water.
Combine the cooked noodles with the sauce, chicken, and veggies. Scatter the toasted sesame seeds and green onions on top, and serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 3 cups fresh snow peas, red bell pepper strips and/or shredded carrots
